component.name: org.nuxeo.ecm.platform.uidgen.service.UIDGeneratorService
component.documentation:
Help to generate unique IDs needed in different situations. The principal scope is to generate UIDs which are external references for Documents. The UIDs formats are defined by extensions to this component and are based on a unique number provided by this component on a specific key given by a generator
@version 1.0 @author Dragos Mihalache

extension.documentation: UID generator is using a Sequencer Factory that provides an implementation of a sequencer having the scope of generating consecutive numbers for a given key.

extension-point.name: generators
extension-point.documentation: The extension point provided by this component gives the possibility to register generators. A generator should be an implementation of org.nuxeo.ecm.platform.uidgen.UIDGenerator or a subclass of org.nuxeo.ecm.platform.uidgen.AbstractUIDGenerator.
